channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023070665
item.description:
Report X-2023070665

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-01
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package came from load area 3 visibly damaged. Upon further inspection, the package has been damaged due to poor lifting technique. One package handler dropped the package on the floor which caused damages to the bottom of the package DescribePack: dropping on the floor DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and spill totes
